attributes.action: Create a more personable and accessible Child Support Agency. With online updates for the Parent with Care about their account information and what action the Child Support Agency are taking for non-payment.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: An exasperated parent with care. I hear nothing from the CSA and have to chase them for even the simplest of replies to enquiries.  When information is sent to them they never acknowledge receipt and do not inform in writing or by phone what action they are taking for non-payment.  I would love online updates about my account information. About money owed and to be able to contact the CSA by internet as it is cheaper than a using a mobile/phone.

rejection.details: In your petition, you refer specifically to your own case. This is potentially libellous. Please re-submit your petition with more generic references to the practices of the CSA.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
